content: and join for working in the round the following instructions create a ribbed that is 1 wide if a narrower or wider brim is preferred adjust the number of rounds between rounds 1-14 accordingly rounds 1-14 knit twisted rib as k3 p2 k3 p2 round 15 purl for both brim options work increase round p10 m1p 99 110 121 stitches all sizes use the larger us6 needles for rest of the hat work owl stitches following the owl chart or written instructions starting with round 3 there will be 9 10 11 owls around the hat after owl stitches knit stockinette rounds until hat measures 9 10 11 from cast on edge knit extra stitches on last round until owls are centered on hat 2 | p ag e owls ©mirielgw 2018 finishing break yarn leaving enough tail to kitchener all stitches across the top of the hat divide stitches into 2 sets of needles first 50 55 61 stitches on one needle next 49 55 60 stitches on second needle do kitchener bind off note that for the small and large sizes on the first stitch only kitchener 2 stitches from first needle with one stitch from the second needle this will make an even number of stitches on both needles for the kitchener bind off turn the hat inside out bring the 2 corners together and stitch with a darning needle and waste yarn as shown below ©mirielgw 2018 this free pattern is for personal non-commercial use only feel free to share with friends but
